description.narrative: Early learning institutions at the national level and in priority districts and regions offer quality and inclusive learning opportunities in a protective and clean environment for the preparation of primary school entry to children aged 3 to 5 years.

mailing-address.narrative: BP 96 Niamakoro Route de l'Aeroport Bamako

sector.narrative: Capacity development of ECD frontline workers
Parenting Programme to promote nurturing care and early stimulation
Provision of (formal and non-formal) early-learning / pre-primary education (including in temporary learning spaces)
Provision of training of school communities e.g. parent teacher associations, school management committees
Provision or procurement of early-learning / pre-primary education learning materials
Technical assistance - Equitable access to quality education
Water supply - institutions (schools, health care facilities, ECD centres)

title.narrative: Mali United Nations Development Assistance Framework Results Matrix
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2018 Mali: Evaluation de la Réponse Humanitaire de l’UNICEF à la Crise Malienne 2013-2017
2019 Mali: Evaluation formative des stratégies de renforcement des capacités au Mali 2015-2019
Mali 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children
Mali Country Office 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Early learning institutions at the national level and in priority districts and regions offer quality and inclusive learning opportunities in a protective and clean environment for the preparation of primary school entry to children aged 3 to 5 years.
Indicateur 1.3.2: Number of out-of-school girls and boys who participated in early learning, through UNICEF-supported programmes KRC 3
Indicateur 1.3.3: Number of girls and boys provided with individual early learning materials through UNICEF-supported programmes- KRC 4
